website_summaries.verdict: A moisturizing body butter that will make a big difference on even the driest of skin.
pros: Dead Sea minerals help rejuvenate skin
Goes on thick, but absorbs quickly
Makes dry, flaking skin soft and smooth
Works well for people with skin conditions
cons: Not everyone finds the scent appealing

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Avani Dead Sea Ultra Rich Body Butter on a whim - more accurately, I was unable to get my usual body butter and stumbled upon this one. I am glad I did. The body butter is rich and creamy, smells pleasantly, and is absorbs fairly quickly into the skin. Unlike others, it does not leave a slimy residue or makes you feel awkwardly sticky. Overall, it leaves my sensitive skin soft, smooth, and soothed. It's a great product - very much recommendable.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: OH YES! Love THE RESULTS.
customer_reviews.text: Avani Dead Sea Body Butter is the only lotion/creme I use on my face. I believe i’m on my fifth jar. That has to tell you I like it very much. It leaves my skin nice and smooth though I am an older woman. The only reason I did not give five stars is the screw-on lid. It does not completely seal the jar. In other words when closing the jar the lid never gets tight. It gets taped when traveling. I love the Avani Dead Sea Body Butter,...so I am a bit inconvenienced.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette

customer_reviews.title: Am basing rating on previous purchase of this same product but in the apple and pear scent.
customer_reviews.text: I gave the apple-pear body butter to my granddaughter for Christmas. Her birthday is this month and she asked if I could buy her more. She has eczema. I had taken a chance with the initial purchase as most body butter/lotions leave her skin feeling "yucky" "greasy" and often aggravates her condition. I'm taking another chance as I was NOT able to find the Avani Spa scent that I had previous bought.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this body butter! I have ultra dry skin and this helps!!! I do add a little Shea butter or coconut oil to mine. I don’t care for the smell it has that grandmother cottony smell to it lol! But I believe you can add your own essential oil to it to drown it out..
customer_reviews.author: Yemi Jaiye

customer_reviews.title: Great face cream for a good price
customer_reviews.text: The Avani shea butter cream is comparable to the Obey Your Body, but at a fraction of the cost. At $14.99 versus $49.99, the choice is obvious. I've used both products and I'm not sure the Obey is much if any higher in quality than the much cheaper Avani. As long as the Avani stays the same and the price does not go sky high, I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Rich Moisture, Light Scent
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for the past two weeks since I recieved it and it's excellent moisture for my dry itchy skin, especially after showering. A little goes a long way, so it's relatively long-lasting and cost-effective. The "scent" is just barely detectable, just pleasant and fresh. I love Dead Sea products for my skin, they are usually natural and effective. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Girl

customer_reviews.title: Best Lotion
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t found this locally yet, so I keep buying on Amazon when I run out. I LOVE this lotion. It doesn’t have a strong smell, but a nice smell. I use it after every shower and it’s so moisturizing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels amazing all over
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time I ordered this product. It feels and smells yummy! I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to the Avani Dead Sea Natural Mineral Body Scrub, a companion product to the rich body butter, while visiting Kona, HI. I was skeptical but tried the combination of the scrub and butter and it really does work. My feet were so rough and excoriated that I thought nothing would ever soften them but with weekly use of the two my feet are getting in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years! I love how well this lotion works!
customer_reviews.author: B.K. McGuire

customer_reviews.title: One of the best and richest body butters I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and the Dead Sea Body Scrub of the same brand for myself for myself for that dry winter skin. They are amazing products that I look forward to using. The body butter is super rich and the scent is soothing. A must have! Would make great gifts too.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: your knees elbows & heels will love it!
customer_reviews.text: after shower apply on moist skin leaves body soft & smooth great for rough spots
customer_reviews.author: THE BUG

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Best skin product I have ever used. Controls the itch from psoriasis and smells so good. Leaves skin feeling so smooth. Great for dry feet also.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Welch

customer_reviews.title: Best Butter out there
customer_reviews.text: Great texture. Moisturizes without greasy residue or having vapor that stings the eyes. Great for feet to put on during the day to moisturize and take away friction from socks/shoes. Great for massage.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Anderegg

customer_reviews.title: Body cream not body butter!
customer_reviews.text: Great smelling product but not functional as body butter moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Adela Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturiser
customer_reviews.text: I have guttate psoriasis and very dry skin. While it doesn't cure the psoriasis, it helps make my skin soft. Absorbs quickly, smells great, a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rozsitch

customer_reviews.title: Great product I have used it before and now am ...
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery. Great product I have used it before and now am glad to have a great place to purchase it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: JANET MAYFIELD

customer_reviews.title: This works wonders
customer_reviews.text: I loved this so much, I ordered additional jars for Christmas presents. Works better than anything else I've tried for dry skin and I like the fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Nanrgran

customer_reviews.title: The only body butter I will use!
customer_reviews.text: The only body butter I will use! Great light smell and long lasting moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: cashley84

customer_reviews.title: TOO SLOW
customer_reviews.text: The product itself was great as I have used it before and that is why I wanted it again. What I was unhappy with, was the time it took to get to my house. I understand when I buy something online it takes sometime (usually 7-10 business days) to get to me through the mail, but this took OVER A MONTH from the time I ordered it to the time it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Carrere

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great
customer_reviews.text: Love these! i was introduced to this product by a co-worker and I absolutely love them. Plus it smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I found this body butter. It smells great and has a nice consistency, ensuring I'll actually use it.
customer_reviews.author: StuffSearcher

customer_reviews.title: I actually like this product normally
customer_reviews.text: I actually like this product normally. This particular one was much thicker and kind of dried out. It's usable, but I probably wouldn't buy it from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: GAIL E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is very moisturizing and smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Tessie H. Delaune

customer_reviews.title: Love the Body Butter
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but the aroma was not there... that was the reason for that purchase ... wonder where the beautiful smell went ..... was not there.......
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne

customer_reviews.title: body butter
customer_reviews.text: this is a wonderful body butter,with the best ingre. Does not leave a mess on my skin,but my skin drinks it up.
customer_reviews.author: sandra richards

customer_reviews.title: It was so good
customer_reviews.text: Because it feat my skin type and work for me. I will recommend that to everybody to try it. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Johnson Ansah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best body butter ever!!!!Its not greasy. It's worth the $$$!
customer_reviews.author: Lovetoshopster

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely gets 5 stars from me. I love, love this hand cream - the best I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy ferguson

customer_reviews.title: used product before
customer_reviews.text: Wish this was available in other scents and on the market. This item was sold at Sam's Club by way of a roadshow which is an in and out item. Wish I could get it in other places.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia M. Walton

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the greatest for soothing many things
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the greatest for soothing many things. Never caused me any problem on my problems. I keep several of these in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Jane Clore

customer_reviews.title: Still waiting.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product over 4 weeks ago. And still haven't had an opportunity to use it. I ordered the scrub and liked how it left my skin. But till waiting for body butter. :-(
customer_reviews.author: guadalupe ortega

customer_reviews.title: Smells like vanilla cake, feels like vaseline
customer_reviews.text: I am Disappointed in this product. I smell like vanilla cake after I put it on, and the texture of butter just like Vaseline with some extra ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: kt

customer_reviews.title: Soothing on my skin
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this body butter after researching many others. It’s rich, melts into the skin and is not greasy. The scent is light and will not compete w your fragrance. Really leaves my skin soft. I am going to purchase two more jars. Another for myself and one for a gift. Price point is very attractive as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rita G.

customer_reviews.title: Love this body butter!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have ever used Avani. I love the light smell and the feel is not greasy. It is a really good moisturizer. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D. Abercrombie

customer_reviews.title: My skin is typical middle aged, dry skin. ...
customer_reviews.text: My skin is typical middle aged, dry skin. This butter is thick, luscious, and goes on heavy. I normally prefer something lighter, however, it doesn't take long to absorb. I only use it a couple times a week, but it could be used daily. It leaves my skin feeling smooth and youthful.
customer_reviews.author: Lorijem

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this moisturizer with the intentions of most arising just my legs. However I use this for my whole body and it works excellent. I am very happy with this purchase and I plan to buy some more once this runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Stuff Inc

customer_reviews.title: The milk & honey has a light sweet scent like vanilla cream & the citrus vanilla also ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely lovely! The milk & honey has a light sweet scent like vanilla cream & the citrus vanilla also smells amazing light & sweet, like a lemon pudding. Both are heavenly, light, yet super moisturizing
customer_reviews.author: Fatima4b

customer_reviews.title: Avani Dead Sea Ultra Rich Body Butter (Milk / Honey)
customer_reviews.text: I was first introduced to this product about a year and half ago at a Sam's Club road show. I bought it there at a great price however, Amazons price is better. A little of this product goes a long way so use it sparingly. It is a great moisturizer and it smells awesome. Yes, it's my favorite body butter!
customer_reviews.author: CYNTHIA

customer_reviews.title: I love love love this lotion
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this lotion.So great, non greasy, super soft feel. I love t. Did I mention the fact that I love it?
customer_reviews.author: Amber Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cream
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandma as a birthday gift, and she absolutely loves it! It's a beautifully creamy lotion, and smells amazing! I definitely recommend for someone who loves body butter that is not too oily.
customer_reviews.author: Shaleen.ashley86

customer_reviews.title: A scent I can handle
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on the milk and honey body butter and I really like it. I'm VERY sensitive to different scents but the milk and honey doesn't bother me at all. It's just a beautiful scent. The body butter just seems so rich. It's cold all winter where I live and your skin can really dry out. I used the body butter most days, especially on my legs.
customer_reviews.author: E. Muller

customer_reviews.title: Rich Body Butter.
customer_reviews.text: This is a rich body butter that is not greasy or oily. I have very dry skin, and this product leaves my skin soft and supple. I thought it was pricy, however when I compare it to my other lotions it is less expensive, because I don't have to use much to be effective.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lay

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizes my skin like nothing else
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizes my skin like nothing else. Soaks in after a few minutes, and does not leave any greasy residue, and smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: I love this cream
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. It moisturizes with the most amazing scent. I highly recommend and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: she does not like it prefers another dead sea product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife, she does not like it prefers another dead sea product.
customer_reviews.author: G. McGrath

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good moisturizer but I wish they made it in unscented
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good moisturizer but I wish they made it in unscented. The scent is very strong and overpowering for anyone with allergies or a sensitivity to perfume. I wish I could use it, but because of the overpowering scent I will not be buying anymore. would have been nice to have known this before I wasted my money on it.
customer_reviews.author: gs

customer_reviews.title: Body butter
customer_reviews.text: This body butter is awesome. Love the feel and smells wonderful
customer_reviews.author: M Glass

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Needed some day cream. Thought it would smell more like Milk and Honey, just smells like regular body cream. It is rich and softens my skin tho, am using it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I have edema (swelling) in feet and calves which tends ...
customer_reviews.text: I have edema (swelling) in feet and calves which tends to inflate my skin almost to breaking point. The Avani soothes and moistens skin to a much more normal condition where fear of breaking/splits vanishes as does the butter into the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Charles M. Lowy

customer_reviews.title: I just loved this product but it needs to be made in ...
customer_reviews.text: I just loved this product but it needs to be made in bigger quantity for I used this up way too soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells lovely, works beautifully- will always have one on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Gail DeMasi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: This is a super thick, body butter. I really like it and would buy again
customer_reviews.author: R. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Smells good but really doesn't hydrate my skin any better then regular lotion I by.
customer_reviews.author: I Shop way to much

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this body butter wonderful for my skin but the fragrance is awesome! I will buy this again before I run out of it!! I would highly recommend this product to others!!
customer_reviews.author: Frances Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: gotta have it
customer_reviews.text: i love this stuff! It really does make a difference on your skin, and it lasts for a long time too. great buy for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Melendez

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing else I've found is better for soft, smooth skin. A little goes a very long way too.
customer_reviews.author: JGemini

customer_reviews.title: Best body butter ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Use it after the milk and honey body scrub. You will not be disapointed. Skin feels amazing.
customer_reviews.author: svan

customer_reviews.title: I use this daily
customer_reviews.text: It softens my skin, I can actually see the difference....and to know it's all natural makes it even better. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: F. Bowman

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. I used it on my feet. We have hardwood floors and my feet were so soft that I nearly slipped and fell.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Thornton

customer_reviews.title: milk and honey scent
customer_reviews.text: Product does NOT smell good at all. I have used another brand and the milk and honet scent was divine. I tried this brand as it 1/2 the price....wish I had bought the more expensive product.Huge difference,would not purchase again even to save the Money.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: smelly
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and I really don't like it because it smells strange and I don't like the way it feels. It is thick and goes on white, so you need to really rub it in. My skin did not feel particularly moist afterward. I was hoping that it would be better that the Bath and Body lotions, but it was not. They smell better and feel about the same (after you rub it in).
customer_reviews.author: anthony channing

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like this very much but not quite like what I have purchased from the Avani store.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Stinks
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells so bad, I threw up because of the smell. I do not recommend anyone to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra Alexander

product_meta.title: AVANI Classic Dead Sea Ultra Rich Milk and Honey Body Butter Moisturizer - Includes Shea Butter, Aloe Vera, Essential Oils - 9.35 Ounce Description change to:AVANI Classic Dead Sea Ultra Rich Milk and Honey Body Butter Moisturizer, 9.35 Ounce
feature_bullets: Rejuvenating Dead Sea minerals have been combined with a rich creamy combination of Shea Butter, Aloe Vera Extract and Essential Oils to create a rich, luxurious Body Butter that will re-hydrate the skin to leave it soft & silky smooth.
